meanings.sent1: The rainbow formed a beautiful arced in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I traced the arced of the river on the map.
meanings.sent3: The arced of the roller coaster made me dizzy.
meanings.sent4: The arced of her smile brightened up the room.
meanings.sent5: The graceful arced of the swan's neck caught my eye.

meanings.definition: To move in a curved path.
meanings.sent1: The ball arced through the air and landed in the basket.
meanings.sent2: The airplane arced gracefully before landing on the runway.
meanings.sent3: The frisbee arced perfectly into the hands of the waiting dog.
meanings.sent4: Her shot arced over the defender and into the goal.
meanings.sent5: The kite arced high in the sky, carried by the wind.

meanings.sent1: The arced handle of the mug fit perfectly in my hand.
meanings.sent2: The arced bridge spanned the river elegantly.
meanings.sent3: The arced tree branches created a natural canopy above us.
meanings.sent4: The arced road led us through the picturesque countryside.
meanings.sent5: The arced petals of the flower opened to reveal its beauty.
